}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|ASUS GT-AX6000}}
A Declaration of Model Names document at the FCC states that this ASUS GT-AC5400 is identical except for its lack of the 10G copper (RJ45) port found in the [[ASUS GT-AX6000]].
A note in the user manual says, "The SFP+ interface only operates at a 10Gbps speed and is not compatible with a 1 Gigabit data rate."
==See also== :[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] *[[ASUS GT-AX11000]] - ''ROG Rapture AX11000 WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AX6000]] (N/S) - ''ROG Rapture Dual Band Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AX95U]] - ''AX11000 Tri Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' :*[[ASUS RT-AX11000]] - ''AX11000 Tri Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AX92U]] - ''AX6100 Tri Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AX88U]] - ''AX6000 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' :*[[ASUS RT-AX6000]] - ''AX6000 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC9600]] - ''ROG Rapture Aura 10G Gaming Router'' *ASUS GT-AC5400 - ''ROG Rapture Dual Band Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC5300]] - ''ROG Rapture Tri Band Gaming Router''
[[Category:English Documentation]]
